title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
So for the past two days I have been having this problem, every time I start up league I get this msg "pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working". I looked it up and tried doing the "Run as administrator" fix but it doesnt work for me, I tried deleting LoL but nothing I just cant get the game to even start, I really need your help guys.
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: This error is super common with permissions issues.  Running as administrator might help sometimes, but not guaranteed and would only work temporarily.  You'll want to instead go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is being added as an exception.  I hope that helps!
